name: Moltres
author: Kagemaru Himeno
flavor_text: One of the legendary bird Pokémon. It is said that its appearance indicates the coming of spring.

poke_power.name: Flame Charge
poke_power.effect: Once during your turn, when you put Moltres from your hand onto your Bench, you may flip a coin. If heads, search your discard pile for up to 3 {R} Energy cards and attach them to Moltres.

attacks.name: Scorching Wing
attacks.effect: Discard all {R} Energy attached to Moltres.
